first_interaction.speaker: Furry Renz
first_interaction.text: Oh hey! Ako si Furry Renz, madalas lang ako tumambay dito sa barangay courtroom. Medyo chill lang, wala naman akong official na ginagawa.

first_interaction.speaker: Furry Renz
first_interaction.text: Naka-costume lang ako kasi trip ko langâ€”parang hobby ba. Huwag mo masyadong seryosohin haha.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Furry Renz
repeated_interaction.text: Uy, ikaw ulit! Mukhang na-enjoy mo rin dito sa courtroom ah.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Furry Renz
repeated_interaction.text: Wala pa rin akong ginagawa, tambay lang ulit. Pero okay lang, masaya naman!
